name: Glitch Blade (Haley Nelson)
description:
Made as a prototype for class in the span of two weeks.

In an underground world filled with dangerous foes in every tunnel, you must learn to bend reality to your will. Bestowed upon you is a sword with space breaking power, and it’s the only thing that stands between you and the truth. Glitch through walls to evade capture and reach freedom on the surface, or die trying.

Team Exploding Meat: Jackson Laumann, Haley Nelson, Adam Field, Luke Hensley, Jacob Gleize
